main event: On May 8, 1949, at Camp Hood, Texas, an observer sighted a diamond-shaped object, described as a brilliant light changing from red to green to white. The object slowed down, dimmed, and then went out as it headed North then East for a duration of 9 minutes.
interesting points: The observed object was diamond-shaped and emitted a brilliant light that changed colors from red to green to white.
It was reported to be approximately 2 miles wide (148 ft wide) and flew at an altitude of 1500', with a speed of 0.3 mph.
The observer described the object as incandescent and very brilliant with no sound or odor.
It appeared to be radio interference, and there were no observed effects on the clouds.
The weather conditions at the time were reported to be good with clear moonlight.
